blocks.name: fvifeq
blocks.content: Equality of function values with conditional arguments, see also ~ fvif . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-May-2018.)

blocks.name: rnfdmpr
blocks.content: The range of a one-to-one function ` F ` of an unordered pair into a set is the unordered pair of the function values. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnfdmpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(crn(c4), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2)))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(crn(c4), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2))))
  eqtrd(crn(c4), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2)), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(crn(c4), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))))
  fnrnfv(hs0, hs1, c4, cpr(c0, c2))
  3eqtr3g(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2)), ciun(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), cun(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wfn(c4, cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(ciun(hs1, cpr(c0, c2), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), cun(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2))))))
  iunxprg(hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2))))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, c4)
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cfv(c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c4)
  iunab(hs1, hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))
  eqtr4i(cun(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2)))), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2)), cun(csn(cfv(c4, c0)), csn(cfv(c4, c2))))
  uneq12i(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2))), csn(cfv(c4, c0)), csn(cfv(c4, c2)))
  eqcomi(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))), csn(cfv(c4, c0)))
  df-sn(hs0, cfv(c4, c0))
  eqcomi(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2))), csn(cfv(c4, c2)))
  df-sn(hs0, cfv(c4, c2))
  df-pr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c4, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c4, c2))
}

thm rnfdmpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 } ‚Üí ran(c4)= {(c4 ` c0),(c4 ` c2)}))
} = {
  ex((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 }, ran(c4)= {(c4 ` c0),(c4 ` c2)})
  eqtrd(ran(c4), {(c4 ` c0),(c4 ` c2)}, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1))}, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 }))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 }, ran(c4)= { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1))})
  fnrnfv(hs0, hs1, c4, { c0, c2 })
  3eqtr3g({ hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1))}, {(c4 ` c0),(c4 ` c2)}, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` hs1)}), ({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)} ‚ãÉ { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)}), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 }))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c4[Fn]{ c0, c2 }, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà { c0, c2 }, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` hs1)})=({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)} ‚ãÉ { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)}))
  iunxprg(hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` hs1)}, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)}, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)})
  abbidv(hs0, hs1 = c0, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1), hs0 =(c4 ` c0))
  eqeq2d(hs0, (c4 ` hs1), (c4 ` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, c4)
  abbidv(hs0, hs1 = c2, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1), hs0 =(c4 ` c2))
  eqeq2d(hs0, (c4 ` hs1), (c4 ` c2), hs1 = c2)
  fveq2(hs1, c2, c4)
  iunab(hs1, hs0, { c0, c2 }, hs0 =(c4 ` hs1))
  eqtr4i(({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)} ‚ãÉ { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)}), {(c4 ` c0),(c4 ` c2)}, ({(c4 ` c0)} ‚ãÉ {(c4 ` c2)}))
  uneq12i({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)}, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)}, {(c4 ` c0)}, {(c4 ` c2)})
  eqcomi({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)}, {(c4 ` c0)})
  df-sn(hs0, (c4 ` c0))
  eqcomi({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)}, {(c4 ` c2)})
  df-sn(hs0, (c4 ` c2))
  df-pr((c4 ` c0), (c4 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0, c2 })
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c({ c0, c2 })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c0)})
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 | hs0 =(c4 ` c2)})
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ` c2))
}

blocks.name: imarnf1pr
blocks.content: The image of the range of a function ` F ` under a function ` E ` if ` F ` is a function from a pair into the domain of ` E ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Feb-2018.)

} = {

  impcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c5)), wf(c5, cdm(c5), c6)), wa(wceq(cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c0)), c7), wceq(cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c2)), c8))), wceq(cima(c5, cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2))), cpr(cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c0)), cfv(c5, cfv(c4, c2)))))

  ffvelrnd(c4, c0, cdm(c5), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wa(wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c5)), wf(c5, cdm(c5), c6)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))))

  adantr(wf(c4, cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c5)), wf(c5, cdm(c5), c6), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(crn(c4), cpr(cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c4, c2)))))
